Reads fastq, looks at content. can write output fastq.gz

# Setup

```{r}
library(ShortRead)
```

```{r}
source(file.path("scripts", "paths.R"))
```

# Read 1

```{r}
R1 <- readFastq(R1_path_OM14)
```

```{r}
writeFastq(R1, file.path(data_path_OM14, "Undetermined_S0_L001_R1_001.fastq.gz"))
```

# Read 2

```{r}
R2 <- readFastq(R2_path_OM14)
```

```{r}
writeFastq(R2, file.path(data_path_OM14, "Undetermined_S0_L001_R2_001.fastq.gz"))
```
